
```{r}
#í¬ì•„ì†¡ í™œìš©
library(lavaan)
library(pscl)
library(semPlot)
library(car)  # VIF ê³„ì‚°
library(MASS) # Poisson ì‚¬ìš©

# ğŸ“Œ ë°ì´í„° ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸°
df <- read.csv("C:/Users/Administrator/Desktop/PADA_LAB/êµ¬ì¡°ë°©ì •ì‹/Count_SEM/scaled_data/amazon_scaled.csv")

# ğŸ“Œ SEM ëª¨ë¸ ì •ì˜
model <- '
  system1 =~ Num_of_Ratings + Is_Photo + Title_Length + Text_Length + Price + Time_Lapsed
  system2 =~ Average_Rating + Deviation_Of_Star_Ratings + FOG_Index + Flesch_Reading_Ease + Depth + Breadth + Valence + Arousal + Interaction
'

# ğŸ“Œ SEM ëª¨ë¸ ì í•©
fit <- sem(model, data = df, estimator = "MLR")

# ğŸ“Œ 1. SEM ì í•©ë„ ì§€í‘œ í™•ì¸
fit_measures <- fitMeasures(fit, c("cfi", "tli", "rmsea", "srmr"))
print("âœ… SEM ì í•©ë„ ì§€í‘œ")
print(fit_measures)

# ğŸ“Œ 2. ìš”ì¸ ì ì¬ëŸ‰(Factor Loadings)
factor_loadings <- parameterEstimates(fit, standardized = TRUE)
print("âœ… ìš”ì¸ ì ì¬ëŸ‰ (Factor Loadings)")
print(factor_loadings)

# ğŸ“Œ 3. AVE & CR ê³„ì‚°
latent_vars <- c("system1", "system2")
AVE_CR <- data.frame(Variable = latent_vars, AVE = NA, CR = NA)

for (i in 1:length(latent_vars)) {
  items <- subset(factor_loadings, lhs == latent_vars[i] & op == "=~")
  loadings <- items$std.all
  AVE_CR$AVE[i] <- mean(loadings^2)  # AVE
  AVE_CR$CR[i] <- sum(loadings)^2 / (sum(loadings)^2 + sum(items$se^2))  # CR
}

print("âœ… AVE & CR")
print(AVE_CR)

# ğŸ“Œ 4. ì ì¬ë³€ìˆ˜ ì¶”ì¶œ
df$Factor1 <- lavPredict(fit)[, "system1"]
df$Factor2 <- lavPredict(fit)[, "system2"]
df$Helpfulness <- as.integer(df$Helpfulness)  # ì •ìˆ˜ ë³€í™˜

# ğŸ“Œ 5. Poisson íšŒê·€ ëª¨ë¸ ì í•©
poisson_model <- glm(Helpfulness ~ Factor1 + Factor2, 
                      data = df, 
                      family = poisson())

# ğŸ“Œ 6. Poisson ëª¨ë¸ ì í•©ë„ í‰ê°€
AIC_poisson <- AIC(poisson_model)
BIC_poisson <- BIC(poisson_model)
pseudo_r2 <- pR2(poisson_model)  # Pseudo RÂ²
logLik_poisson <- logLik(poisson_model)

# ğŸ“Œ 7. ë‹¤ì¤‘ê³µì„ ì„± í™•ì¸ (VIF)
vif_values <- vif(poisson_model)

# ğŸ“Œ 8. ê²°ê³¼ ì¶œë ¥
print("âœ… Poisson íšŒê·€ ê²°ê³¼")
print(summary(poisson_model))

print("âœ… Poisson Model - AIC, BIC, Pseudo RÂ², LogLik")
print(AIC_poisson)
print(BIC_poisson)
print(pseudo_r2)
print(logLik_poisson)

print("âœ… ë‹¤ì¤‘ê³µì„ ì„± í™•ì¸ (VIF)")
print(vif_values)

# ğŸ“Œ 9. SEM ì‹œê°í™” (êµ¬ì¡°ë°©ì •ì‹ ë‹¤ì´ì–´ê·¸ë¨)
semPaths(fit, "std", layout = "tree", whatLabels = "std", edge.label.cex = 1.2)


```

```{r}
#zero_infalted í™œìš©
library(lavaan)
library(pscl)
library(semPlot)
library(car)  # VIF ê³„ì‚°ì„ ìœ„í•´ ì¶”ê°€

# ë°ì´í„° ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸°
df <- read.csv("C:/Users/Administrator/Desktop/PADA_LAB/êµ¬ì¡°ë°©ì •ì‹/Count_SEM/scaled_data/amazon_scaled.csv")

# SEM ëª¨ë¸ ì •ì˜
model <- '
  system1 =~ Num_of_Ratings + Is_Photo + Title_Length + Text_Length + Price + Time_Lapsed
  system2 =~ Average_Rating + Deviation_Of_Star_Ratings + FOG_Index + Flesch_Reading_Ease + Depth + Breadth + Valence + Arousal + Interaction
'

# SEM ëª¨ë¸ ì í•©
fit <- sem(model, data = df, estimator = "MLR")

# ğŸ“Œ SEM ì í•©ë„ ì§€í‘œ í™•ì¸
fit_measures <- fitMeasures(fit, c("cfi", "tli", "rmsea", "srmr"))
print(fit_measures)

# ğŸ“Œ ìš”ì¸ ì ì¬ëŸ‰(Factor Loadings)
factor_loadings <- parameterEstimates(fit, standardized = TRUE)
print(factor_loadings)

# ğŸ“Œ AVE & CR ê³„ì‚°
latent_vars <- c("system1", "system2")
AVE_CR <- data.frame(Variable = latent_vars, AVE = NA, CR = NA)

for (i in 1:length(latent_vars)) {
  items <- subset(factor_loadings, lhs == latent_vars[i] & op == "=~")
  loadings <- items$std.all
  AVE_CR$AVE[i] <- mean(loadings^2)  # AVE
  AVE_CR$CR[i] <- sum(loadings)^2 / (sum(loadings)^2 + sum(items$se^2))  # CR
}

print(AVE_CR)

# ğŸ“Œ ì ì¬ë³€ìˆ˜ ì¶”ì¶œ
df$Factor1 <- lavPredict(fit)[, "system1"]
df$Factor2 <- lavPredict(fit)[, "system2"]
df$Helpfulness <- as.integer(df$Helpfulness)  # ì •ìˆ˜ ë³€í™˜

# ğŸ“Œ ZINB ëª¨ë¸ ì í•©
zinb_model <- zeroinfl(Helpfulness ~ Factor1 + Factor2, 
                       data = df, 
                       dist = "negbin", 
                       link = "logit")

# ğŸ“Œ ZINB ëª¨ë¸ ì í•©ë„ í‰ê°€
AIC_value <- AIC(zinb_model)
BIC_value <- BIC(zinb_model)
pseudo_r2 <- pR2(zinb_model)
logLik_value <- logLik(zinb_model)

# ğŸ“Œ ë‹¤ì¤‘ê³µì„ ì„± í™•ì¸ (VIF)
vif_values <- vif(zinb_model)
print(vif_values)

# ğŸ“Œ ê²°ê³¼ ì¶œë ¥
print(summary(zinb_model))
print(AIC_value)
print(BIC_value)
print(pseudo_r2)
print(logLik_value)

# ğŸ“Œ SEM ì‹œê°í™” (êµ¬ì¡°ë°©ì •ì‹ ë‹¤ì´ì–´ê·¸ë¨)
semPaths(fit, "std", layout = "tree", whatLabels = "std", edge.label.cex = 1.2)

```
